comments.body: Actually it's quite easy for you guys no offense, just the right time and the right people you know you will be in a team of pros And need not do anything
Lol I don‚Äôt want to be in a group where all the work is done, neither do I want to be in a group where no one does anything that‚Äôs the problem
If u are in the 6-7 range , it's the easiest for u. It's quite tough to get good teams later on for people with 7-8 cgpa

Option 1: It's better to join your friend's team if you have the option.

Option 2: If you don't have a team, the department will send a form for students without a team. And  new teams will be formed among those students.

However,  most of the students in this group usually have a CGPA below 7,The problem with Option 2 is that there might be members who won't contribute at all .

So, better to go with Option 1.
Because many people are in that range so most teams will find their teammates in that range and at the end majority of the people left without a team will be people in the 7-8 region
That won't be a problem. Just post your topic idea and ask in the class group if anyone wants to join
